extension.name: checkboxwithimage
extension.caption: Checkbox with Image
extension.author: Lee Cher Yeong
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: Allows you to use image as the check box label.

field.name: images
field.label: Images
field.description: Enter the URLs of images corresponding to the elements defined for this custom field. URLs must be separated by |. You can use {live_site} as the replacement for your site's base URL. ie: {live_site}/media/media/images/mime-icon-32/zip.png|{live_site}/media/media/images/mime-icon-32/mp3.png

field.name: captions
field.label: Captions
field.description: Captions are display beside the image to provide a short description of each checkbox. Enter the captions corresponding to the elements defined for this custom field. Captions must be separated by |.

field.name: alts
field.label: Image ALTs attribute
field.description: ALTs attribute are included in your image for accessibility and allow user agents that cannot display images to use this as alternatee text. Keep it short and precise. If you leave this empty, field elements will be used for this. Enter the ALT texts corresponding to the elements defined for this custom field. ALT texts must be separated by |.

field.name: titles
field.label: Image TITLEs attribute
field.description: This will be added to your images as Title attribute. Use this to provide additional information to each of your images. Most browsers display title text as a tooltip when it is hovered over. Enter the TITLE texts corresponding to the elements defined for this custom field. TITLE texts must be separated by |.

field.name: columns
field.label: Columns
field.description: Enter the number of columns used to display each of the checkboxes in Edit Listing form. By default, it is set to automatically arrange itself based on available width and the size of each checkbox.
